properties.Name_of_th: In between the boundaries of Rathmalkaduwa and Sinhapitiya
properties.Observatio: This canal is fed by spring water and people use the water irregularly.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of 2.0 m long and 0.5 m high  concrete wall to be acted as an anicut

Clearing the site and scarifying the surfaces of the existing anicut

Common excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus up to 30m by Manually.

Ply

properties.Observatio: This is not a tube well. This well was used for bathing (L=3.5m, W=2.1m, H=0.9m). The well is currently water leaking water. There is no boundaries and no space to planting trees.
properties.Descriptio:
Plastering of the walls of the well

Scarifying existing rock or concrete surface

Plaster 12mm thick in 1:3 cement and sand finished smooth with gray cement floating

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%
properties.photopath: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MWS003-GIS/MWS003-GIS.github.io/main/IWWRMP/Data/EXD/200_photo/MWS_133_2/Drinking Water Sources to be Conserved - Wellangiriya Well.jpg

properties.Observatio: The water source has been developed and the boundaries have been marked. Water is pumped into stock tank and distributed, but villagers say the stock tanks are not sufficient.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of a new stock Tank

Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal t 3mx3mx2.5

Connecting the two stock tanks with necessary pipes and fittings

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

Planting trees around the tank

Veget
